scenes.action_text: CHERRY FALLS SCREENPLAY BY KEN SELDEN FIRST DRAFT FEBRUARY 14, 1998 FADE IN: EXT. TOWN - NIGHT The hanging sign says 'Entering Cherry Falls, Ohio' We see Cherry Falls - A small town in rural Northeastern Ohio. This is Norman Rockwell land, red barns on dirt roads, a square in the center of town. But things are hidden here. The barns are locked, the shades are drawn. Dissolve to:
